ItemTooltip.CompanionCube: 'Summons a Lil Man to keep you safe. Unless..'
ItemTooltip.EatersBone: 'A shard of a star? Why is down here in the corruption?'
ItemTooltip.LesserHealingPotion: 'Macro-Munch! Now in bar form, just to get a lil bigger. On the go!'
ItemTooltip.HealingPotion: 'A burger so good you can feel the pounds getting added on!'
ItemTooltip.GreaterHealingPotion: 'Macro-Munch Meal! Now with 20% more growth power, and all of your daily vitamins!'

BuffDescription.CompanionCube: 'What is that thing? It-Its watching me..'
BuffDescription.EatersBone: 'A small manifestation of something way bigger.'
BuffDescription.PotionSickness: 'Your tummy is so full. Listen to it churn as you break all that down..'
